dict.acceptation: 祈祷；祈祷（习惯）；祈祷文；经文；

sent.orig: Lord's prayer, common prayer, World Day of Prayer, etc.
The correct prayer is therefore never a prayer of supplication, but a prayer of gratitude.
sent.trans: 因此，正确的祈祷永远不是恳求的祈祷，而是感恩的祷告。

sent.orig: Does Scripture have other prayer instructions besides The Lord's Prayer?
sent.trans: 圣经除了主祷文外，是否还有其它关于祷告的教导？

sent.orig: He the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.
sent.trans: 他垂听穷人的祷告，并不藐视他们的祈求。

sent.orig: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.
sent.trans: 他要垂顾困苦人的祷告，必不藐视他们的祈求。
